description: Jake Porter is bored to death with fucking people his own age and when he hears about a revolutionary new service called Dial-A-Daddy he wastes no time putting it to use. Jake calls up jacked daddy John Magnum. The pair hit it off, but before the shaved-headed stud is willing to give the muscular Jake the servicing he called for, he's going to do what a daddy does best and make the fit young jock clean his room. Once he's satisfied with Jake's work, John finally gives him what he's begging for and pounds the athletic hunk's hole hard until he can't take it anymore.
title: Got Daddy?: Bareback
